Summary: A UFO spun in a circular manner, fading and appearing..
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around July 13th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in a car, while someone was driving me, and I took my cmaera to see the sights of Philly. Then, I looked up into the sky, and I saw a huge light, I thought at first it was a star, or the Moon. Then, I noticed the light grew brighter, and it started to move in a circular motion, like a ball going down a solid whirlpool. I felt really scared, and excited at the same time, because I didn't know what it was, or if it was gonna come closer to me. As we drove away, the object started to pulsate, and then fade away.
